client
Class Job

java.lang.Object
  client.Job
Direct Known Subclasses:
MandelbrotSetJob, TspJob
public abstract class Job
extends java.lang.Object

Interface that defines a job to be executed remotely.

Author:
Manasa Chandrasekhar, Kowshik Prakasam

Constructor Summary
Job()
           
 
Method Summary
abstract  void collectResults(Space space)
          Gathers Result objects from the compute space.
abstract  void generateTasks(Space space)
          Decomposes a complex job into a list of smaller tasks of type Task, each of which are executed remotely in a compute space (Space)
abstract  java.lang.Object getAllResults()
          Transforms values returned by Result objects into something relevant to the subclass implementing this interface.

Constructor Detail

Job

public Job()
Method Detail

generateTasks

public abstract void generateTasks(Space space)
                            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Decomposes a complex job into a list of smaller tasks of type Task, each of which are executed remotely in a compute space (Space)

Parameters:
space - Compute space to which Task objects should be sent for execution
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - If the compute space throws RemoteException while writing tasks to it, then the exception is in turn thrown by this method

collectResults

public abstract void collectResults(Space space)
                             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Gathers Result objects from the compute space. This method should be executed only after completion of generateTasks(Space) method that generates the results.

Parameters:
space - Compute space encapsulating the results obtained after remote execution of tasks
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

getAllResults

public abstract java.lang.Object getAllResults()
Transforms values returned by Result objects into something relevant to the subclass implementing this interface.

Returns:
A container with values from all Result objects
